summary: This is a simple replacer for the Vaermina statue.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Vaermina Effigy
Author: Edhildil
07,27,2014
ver1

LOL! This is a JOKE mod. If this bothers you please just skip this mod.

This is a simple replacer for the Vaermina statue.

This is mostly just a silly mod but I thought some of you would like it.

Vaermina represents nightmares and horror. I made this to reflect that.

This mesh is used alot in Nightcaller Temple so expect a big change there.


File:

Data_meshes_clutter_statues_statuevaermina.nif
Data_meshes_clutter_statues_vaerminastatue_statuevaerminasecretdoor01.nif
Data_Textures_armor_edhildil_vaerminaskin.dds
Data_Textures_armor_edhildil_vaerminaskin_n.dds

The statue wo'nt change if you use a mod that redirects the original mesh

filepath.


Tools:

Blender
Nifscope

Credits:

Edhildil (statue)
Sevenity (sevenbase body)
Bethesda (original statue mesh)

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

Usage:

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed

in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so

I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
